a.n: Long Tall Dex live at North Sea Jazz

p.k: This broadcast from the North Sea Jazz Archives presents the legendary saxophone player Dexter Gordon.
p.d: The world-renowned North Sea Jazz Festival features a wide variety of genres, including traditional New Orleans jazz, swing, bop, free jazz, fusion, avant-garde and electronic jazz, blues, gospel, funk, soul, R&B, hip hop, world beat and Latin. The festival was founded by entrepreneur and jazz fan Paul Acket, who sold his highly successful pop magazine publishing house to organise and fund the first edition of the festival in 1976. This broadcast from the North Sea Jazz Archives presents the legendary saxophone player Dexter Gordon.
